CmdLine: apt-get update &&         apt-get -y install libjpeg-dev libpng-dev libtiff-dev                 autoconf automake libass-dev libfreetype6-dev                 libtheora-dev libtool libvorbis-dev                 pkg-config texinfo zlib1g-dev unzip                 libx264-dev libmp3lame-dev yasm && 	wget http://ffmpeg.org/releases/ffmpeg-3.2.2.tar.bz2 && 	tar xvf ffmpeg-3.2.2.tar.bz2 && 	cd ffmpeg-3.2.2 && 	./configure --enable-shared --enable-gpl --enable-libx264 --enable-libmp3lame && 	make && 	make install && 	cd .. && rm -rf ffmpeg-3.2.2 &&         rm ffmpeg-3.2.2.tar.bz2 && 	apt-get -y clean all && 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
